turn.0: ELI5: how is Erdogan threatening to let migrants into Europe actually a threat when migrants are so great?
turn.1: > About what?  Claiming "migrants are so great," for one. Do you have quote from anyone saying this? Or are you just confused?   You also implied that all Fortune 50 companies were founded by natives. More evidence of your confusion.   > How is that white nationalist?  Because you are, either willingly or not, speaking the same way about migrants as white nationalists do.   > Doesn't the US also have a huge amount of poverty, gun violence, and civil unrest though?  Yeah, sort of, but mostly among people whose families have been here for generations. Immigrants have much lower crime rates than individuals born in the US.

How so?     >Yeah, sort of, but mostly among people whose families have been here for generations. Immigrants have much lower crime rates than individuals born in the US.  Wow. How did it go for them when immigrants came?  Not well. As you know, Western Civilization is founded on violence/slavery/genocide.
